text:
Reminder: You can find our developer content on HubSpot academy by going to <https://academy.HubSpot.com/results?q=developer&library=true>

Additionally we have a YouTube Channel with a developer podcast and some great developer content <https://www.youtube.com/c/HubSpotDevelopers/playlists>

I may have gotten carried away with reminders. Lol if anyone gets annoyed by them just give a shout. Just figured there are common questions that pop up, and sometimes itâ€™s great to surface them right in channels on a recurring but not obnoxious basis.

Hi everyone, I am nearly done with the CMS for Developers practicum, but I am hung up on the requirement for the team modules that you must resize from 3 columns to 2 columns. I have been able to resize from 3 to 1, but I can't figure out how to get down to 2 columns. Can anyone give me any tips? Thank you!
Hey <@U02FUCP1ZFB>!  Congrats on getting so close!  Most likely, you are missing media query, but you should post your code in the thread
